definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="6"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Monday - It's Coming </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">[</field></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">,</field></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">]</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced"><field name="potion">SLOW_FALLING</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100000</field></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="move_entity"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2000</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
